vsParam: So, can you tell us what happened, Wistyria?

... Sorry, guys. I meant to help you.
And then, I wanted to get this...

The emerald board... You ran straight there
after you heard it from Bill Berry?

Yes... But I was attacked by monsters...
I... I'm sorry for all the trouble I caused you!

Ouch, don't pull my hair...
Huh? Peppermint?

That's your punishment. Do you even know
how much we were worried about you!?
You went to get that emerald board for us, didn't you?

We're pleased that you want to help us.
But... You need to reflect on yourself.

I once did such things too which made them angry.
But now, I get how they felt.

Even Wistyria got the emerald board...
We'd be so sad if she got injured.

...! Yeah... That's true.
Hee hee hee, I'm your "family", comrade...

I made such a big mistake, I'm really sorry!
I'll work on it!!

Yeah, good then! Ah, as an extra punishment,
treat us with the canteen special set meals~

Oh, that's good!
I've never tried a set meal yet——

Huh, it is very expensive!?
I'll go broke to treat all of you!?

... You made us worry about you, so you
deserve it. Wistyria... I'm so looking forward to it.

Huh huh huh huh huh? Even you, Angelica——!?
Uh—— You're so bad!!
